Charles Waldron https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Waldron 0 Charles Waldron (December 24, 1874 – March 4, 1946) was an American stage and film actor, sometimes credited as Charles Waldron Sr., Chas. Waldron Sr., Charles D. Waldron or Mr. Waldron. Charles_Waldron ( December_24_,_1874 – March_4_,_1946 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actor , sometimes_credited as Charles_Waldron_Sr. , Chas . Waldron_Sr. , Charles_D._Waldron or Mr._Waldron .
